nodes.description: 2016年6月28日，ISIS成员在伊斯坦布尔阿塔图尔克国际机场发动自杀式袭击，造成44人死亡
nodes.support_text: Three terrorists armed with bombs and guns attacked the main international terminal, opening fire and eventually detonating their devices.

nodes.description: 土耳其官员证实ISIS高层参与袭击策划，3名来自俄罗斯、乌兹别克斯坦和吉尔吉斯斯坦的袭击者1个月前从叙利亚拉卡进入土耳其
nodes.support_text: Turkish officials have strong evidence that ISIS leadership was involved in the planning of the Istanbul airport terrorist attack, a senior government source told CNN on Thursday.

nodes.description: 伊斯坦布尔法蒂赫区一处公寓内发现嫌疑人护照，警方通过监控视频锁定3名嫌疑人特征
nodes.support_text: Police showed residents of Fatih this image of three suspects. Among the pictures was a screen grab from surveillance video at the airport that shows three men wearing thick jackets and carrying bags.

nodes.description: 机场袭击采用'inghimasi'战术：先开枪扫射再引爆炸弹，两枚炸弹分别位于国际航站楼和安检口
nodes.support_text: The tactic -- to enter shooting, and then detonate explosives -- is called 'inghimasi'.

nodes.description: 6月29日死亡 toll 更新：3岁巴勒斯坦男孩因伤势过重死亡，土耳其国内新增1名遇难者
nodes.support_text: The death toll rose to 44 when a 3-year-old Palestinian boy hurt in the attack died.

nodes.description: 吉尔吉斯斯坦外交部否认袭击者国籍指控，称土耳其官方正在核实身份
nodes.support_text: Kyrgyzstan's foreign ministry disputed reports that one of the attackers was from that country.

nodes.description: 6月29日伊斯坦布尔和伊兹密尔共拘留22名关联人员，其中3人为外国人
nodes.support_text: JUST WATCHED Anatomy of an explosion Replay More Videos ... MUST WATCH Anatomy of an explosion 01:11 Thirteen were taken into custody in Istanbul and nine in the coastal city of Izmir, the official said.

nodes.description: CNN分析师指出：袭击者来自前苏联国家，ISIS境内有2,000-7,000名俄语系战斗人员
nodes.support_text: Estimates of Russian fighters involved with ISIS range from 2,000 to 7,000.

nodes.description: 伊斯坦布尔机场成为今年土耳其第8起自杀式袭击目标，累计死亡人数达140人
nodes.support_text: The airport attack marked the eighth suicide bombing in Turkey this year.

nodes.description: 土耳其因打击ISIS和PKK导致旅游业受创，2016年游客量约3.94亿人次
nodes.support_text: The violence has also rattled Turkey's tourism industry, a key sector of the national economy. About 39.4 million people visit each year.

nodes.description: Bekir Yar Emlak owner向警方透露照片显示曾住在公寓的男子可能是嫌疑人
nodes.support_text: 男子向警方透露照片显示曾住在公寓的男子可能是嫌疑人

nodes.support_text: 埃尔桑陈述被展示攻击者图片

nodes.description: 其他邻居询问是否漏气

nodes.description: 国家媒体披露被拘留者中包含3名外国人
nodes.support_text: state media disclosed that three foreign nationals were among those taken into custody

edges.support_text: Turkish officials have strong evidence that ISIS leadership was involved in the planning of the Istanbul airport terrorist attack, a senior government source told CNN on Thursday.
The death toll rose to 44 when a 3-year-old Palestinian boy hurt in the attack died.
The airport attack marked the eighth suicide bombing in Turkey this year.
The violence has also rattled Turkey's tourism industry, a key sector of the national economy. About 39.4 million people visit each year.
Police showed residents of Fatih this image of three suspects.
Kyrgyzstan's foreign ministry disputed reports that one of the attackers was from that country.

JUST WATCHED Anatomy of an explosion Replay More Videos ... MUST WATCH Anatomy of an explosion 01:11 Thirteen were taken into custody in Istanbul and nine in the coastal city of Izmir, the official said.
Estimates of Russian fighters involved with ISIS range from 2,000 to 7,000.
The tactic -- to enter shooting, and then detonate explosives -- is called 'inghimasi'.
CNN分析师指出：袭击者来自前苏联国家，ISIS境内有2,000-7,000名俄语系战斗人员
媒体披露基于警方拘留行动的后续信息
